#summary Niezbyt wyrafinowane wyszukiwanie liczb pierwszych
#labels CodeExamples

*primes.omtt*:
{{{
%% module samples.primes
%% use std.math
%% use html as html

// finds prime numbers from 2 to n (n >= 3)
% def primes n:
	def is_prime k:
		empty (2..(k | sqrt | round) where k mod _ == 0)
	in:
		(2, 3, 5..n[is_prime _])
% end

% def list_primes n
	% def from = 950
	% and title
		Primes from {from} to {n}
	% in
	<html>
		<head><title>{title}</title></head>
		<body>
			<h2>{title}</h2>
			{	primes n
				where _ > from 
				apply html::list
			}
		</body>
	</html>
	% end
% end
}}}
